groupby.description: A list of fields to split the data into groups.

field.description: The name of the field to aggregate.

as.description: An optional array of names to use for the output fields.

binTransform.title: Bin transform
binTransform.description: Bins values into quantitative bins (e.g., for a histogram).

field.description: The name of the field to bin values from.

min.description: The minimum bin value to consider.

max.description: The maximum bin value to consider.

base.description: The number base to use for automatic bin determination.

maxbins.description: The maximum number of allowable bins.

step.description: An exact step size to use between bins. If provided, options such as maxbins will be ignored.

steps.description: An array of allowable step sizes to choose from.

minstep.description: A minimum allowable step size (particularly useful for integer values).

div.description: An array of scale factors indicating allowable subdivisions.

crossTransform.title: Cross transform
crossTransform.description: Compute the cross-product of two data sets.

with.description: The name of the secondary data set to cross with the primary data. If unspecified, the primary data is crossed with itself.

diagonal.description: If false, items along the "diagonal" of the cross-product (those elements with the same index in their respective array) will not be included in the output.

filter.description: A string containing an expression (in JavaScript syntax) to filter the resulting data elements.

field.description: The field containing the text to analyze.

pattern.description: A regexp pattern for matching words in text.

stopwords.description: A regexp pattern for matching stopwords to omit.

linkpathTransform.title: LinkPath transform
linkpathTransform.description: Computes a path definition for connecting nodes within a node-link network or tree diagram.

sourceX.description: The data field that references the source x-coordinate for this link.

sourceY.description: The data field that references the source y-coordinate for this link.

targetX.description: The data field that references the target x-coordinate for this link.

targetY.description: The data field that references the target y-coordinate for this link.

tension.description: A tension parameter for the "tightness" of "curve"-shaped links.

facetTransform.title: Facet transform
facetTransform.description: A special aggregate transform that organizes a data set into groups or "facets".

groupby.description: A list of fields to split the data into groups.

field.description: The name of the field to aggregate.

as.description: An optional array of names to use for the output fields.

filterTransform.title: Filter transform
filterTransform.description: Filters elements from a data set to remove unwanted items.

test.description: A string containing an expression (in JavaScript syntax) for the filter predicate.

foldTransform.title: Fold transform
foldTransform.description: Collapse ("fold") one or more data properties into two properties.

oneOf.description: An array of field references indicating the data properties to fold.

forceTransform.title: Force transform
forceTransform.description: Performs force-directed layout for network data.

size.description: The dimensions [width, height] of this force layout.

links.description: The name of the link (edge) data set.

linkDistance.description: Determines the length of edges, in pixels.

linkStrength.description: Determines the tension of edges (the spring constant).

charge.description: The strength of the charge each node exerts.

chargeDistance.description: The maximum distance over which charge forces are applied.

iterations.description: The number of iterations to run the force directed layout.

friction.description: The strength of the friction force used to stabilize the layout.

theta.description: The theta parameter for the Barnes-Hut algorithm, which is used to compute charge forces between nodes.

gravity.description: The strength of the pseudo-gravity force that pulls nodes towards the center of the layout area.

alpha.description: A "temperature" parameter that determines how much node positions are adjusted at each step.

formulaTransform.title: Formula transform
formulaTransform.description: Extends data elements with new values according to a calculation formula.

field.description: The property name in which to store the computed formula value.

expr.description: A string containing an expression (in JavaScript syntax) for the formula.

geoTransform.title: Geo transform
geoTransform.description: Performs a cartographic projection. Given longitude and latitude values, sets corresponding x and y properties for a mark.

projection.description: The type of cartographic projection to use.

precision.description: The desired precision of the projection.

clipAngle.description: The clip angle of the projection.

clipExtent.description: The clip extent of the projection.

geopathTransform.title: GeoPath transform
geopathTransform.description: Creates paths for geographic regions, such as countries, states and counties.

field.description: The data field containing GeoJSON Feature data.

projection.description: The type of cartographic projection to use.

precision.description: The desired precision of the projection.

clipAngle.description: The clip angle of the projection.

clipExtent.description: The clip extent of the projection.

sort.description: A list of fields to use as sort criteria for sibling nodes.

children.description: The data field for the children node array

parent.description: The data field for the parent node

field.description: The value for the area of each leaf-level node for partition layouts.

mode.description: The layout algorithm mode to use.

size.description: The dimensions of the tree layout

nodesize.description: Sets a fixed x,y size for each node (overrides the size parameter)

value.description: The value to use for missing data if the method is 'value'.

groupby.description: A list of fields to group the data into series.

orderby.description: A list of fields to determine ordering within series.

lookupTransform.title: Lookup transform
lookupTransform.description: Extends a data set by looking up values in another data set.

on.description: The name of the secondary data set on which to lookup values.

onKey.description: The key field to lookup, or null for index-based lookup.

keys.description: One or more fields in the primary data set to match against the secondary data set.

as.description: The names of the fields in which to store looked-up values.

default.description: The default value to use if a lookup match fails.

field.description: The data values to encode as angular spans. If this property is omitted, all pie slices will have equal spans.

sort.description: If true, will sort the data prior to computing angles.

sortTransform.title: Sort transform
sortTransform.description: Sorts the values of a data set.

by.description: A list of fields to use as sort criteria.

stackTransform.title: Stack transform
stackTransform.description: Computes layout values for stacked graphs, as in stacked bar charts or stream graphs.

groupby.description: A list of fields to split the data into groups (stacks).

sortby.description: A list of fields to determine the sort order of stacks.

field.description: The data field that determines the thickness/height of stacks.

groupby.description: An ordered list of fields by which to group tuples into a tree.

sort.description: A list of fields to use as sort criteria for sibling nodes.

children.description: The data field for the children node array

parent.description: The data field for the parent node

field.description: The values to use to determine the area of each leaf-level treemap cell.

mode.description: The treemap layout algorithm to use.

size.description: The dimensions of the treemap layout

round.description: If true, treemap cell dimensions will be rounded to integer pixels.

sticky.description: If true, repeated runs of the treemap will use cached partition boundaries.

ratio.description: The target aspect ratio for the layout to optimize.

padding.description: he padding (in pixels) to provide around internal nodes in the treemap.

clipExtent.description: The min and max points at which to clip the voronoi diagram.

size.description: The dimensions of the wordcloud layout

font.description: The font face to use for a word.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for a word.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for a word.

fontSize.description: The font size to use for a word.

fontScale.description: The minimum and maximum scaled font sizes, or null to prevent scaling.

rotate.description: The field or number to set the roration angle (in degrees).

text.description: The field containing the text to use for each word.

spiral.description: The type of spiral used for positioning words, either 'archimedean' or 'rectangular'.
